濃厚.definition: dense; thick (fog, clouds etc); to have a strong interest in; deep; fully saturated (color)

濃墨重彩.definition: thick and heavy in colors; to describe sth in colorful language with attention to detail (idiom)

濃妝艷抹.definition: to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom); dressed to the nines and wearing makeup

濃度.definition: concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution); consistency; thickness; density; viscosity

濃淡.definition: shade (of a color, i.e. light or dark)

濃縮.definition: to concentrate (a liquid); concentration; espresso coffee; abbr. for 意式濃縮咖啡|意式浓缩咖啡

濃郁.definition: rich; strong; heavy (fragrance); dense; full-bodied; intense

濃重.definition: dense; thick; strong; rich (colors); heavy (aroma); deep (friendship); profound (effect)
